00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "KviPointerList.h"
00029 #include "KviCString.h"
00030 #include "KviQString.h"
00031 #include "KviConsoleWindow.h"
00032 
00033 class KviIrcConnection;
00034 class KviIrcContext;
00035 class KviConneciton;
00036 
00037 
00038 //
00039 // This is a single IRC message received from the server.
00040 // The message is strictly associated to the connection it came from.
00041 //
00042 // The IRC protocol is strictly 8 bit and thus the strings
00043 // are all 8 bit strings. The decoding of these strings should
00044 // be done on the targeting context (mainly channel or query...)
00045 //
00046 
00047 class KVIRC_API KviIrcMessage
00048 {
00049 public:
00050 
00051         KviIrcMessage(const char * message,KviIrcConnection * pConnection);
00052 
00053         ~KviIrcMessage();
00054 
00055 public:
00056 
00060         enum Flags
00061         {
00066                 HaltOutput = 1,
00070                 Unrecognized = 2
00071         };
00072 
00073 private:
00074         const char * m_ptr;                // shallow! never null
00075         KviCString m_szPrefix;           // the extracted prefix string
00076         KviCString m_szCommand;          // the extracted command (may be numeric)
00077         KviPointerList<KviCString> * m_pParams;            // the list of parameters
00078         KviConsoleWindow * m_pConsole;           // the console we're attacched to
00079         KviIrcConnection * m_pConnection;        // the connection we're attacched to
00080         int m_iNumericCommand;    // the numeric of the command (0 if non numeric)
00081         int m_iFlags;             // yes.. flags :D
00082 public:
00083         KviConsoleWindow * console(){ return m_pConsole; };
00084         KviIrcConnection * connection(){ return m_pConsole->connection(); };
00085 
00086         bool isNumeric(){ return (m_iNumericCommand >= 0); };
00087         const char * command(){ return m_szCommand.ptr(); };
00088         KviCString * commandPtr(){ return &m_szCommand; };
00089         int numeric(){ return m_iNumericCommand; };
00090 
00091         KviCString * prefixPtr(){ return &m_szPrefix; };
00092         const char * prefix(){ return m_szPrefix.ptr(); };
00093         const char * safePrefix();
00094         bool hasPrefix(){ return m_szPrefix.hasData(); };
00095 
00096         bool isEmpty(){ return (m_szPrefix.isEmpty() && m_szCommand.isEmpty() && m_pParams->isEmpty()); };
00097 
00098         int paramCount(){ return m_pParams->count(); };
00099 
00100         const char * param(unsigned int idx){ return (idx < m_pParams->count()) ? m_pParams->at(idx)->ptr() : 0; };
00101 
00102         const char * safeParam(unsigned int idx){ return (idx < m_pParams->count()) ? m_pParams->at(idx)->ptr() : KviCString::emptyString().ptr(); };
00103 
00104         KviCString * paramString(unsigned int idx){ return m_pParams->at(idx); };
00105 
00106         const char * trailing(){ KviCString * tr = m_pParams->last(); return tr ? tr->ptr() : 0; };
00107         KviCString * trailingString(){ return m_pParams->last(); };
00108         KviCString & safeTrailingString(){ KviCString * tr = m_pParams->last(); return tr ? *tr : KviCString::emptyString(); };
00109         const char * safeTrailing(){ KviCString * tr = m_pParams->last(); return tr ? tr->ptr() : KviCString::emptyString().ptr(); };
00110 
00111         const char * allParams(){ return m_ptr; };
00112 
00113         KviCString * firstParam(){ return m_pParams->first(); };
00114         KviCString * nextParam(){ return m_pParams->next(); };
00115 
00116         void setHaltOutput(){ m_iFlags |= HaltOutput; };
00117         bool haltOutput(){ return (m_iFlags & HaltOutput); };
00118         void setUnrecognized(){ m_iFlags |= Unrecognized; };
00119         bool unrecognized(){ return (m_iFlags & Unrecognized); };
00120 
00121         void decodeAndSplitPrefix(QString &szNick,QString &szUser,QString &szHost);
00122         void decodeAndSplitMask(char * mask,QString &szNick,QString &szUser,QString &szHost);
00123 };
00124 
00125 #endif //_KVI_IRCMESSAGE_H_
